title: Please Help Me )":
body: Ok So I Bought A New PC and downloaded league it was ok at first in-game I had 100-300 FPS. but later the same day that I was playing my FPS was stuck at 30 (it didn't get higher I switched to low graphics still 30 then I used high still 30) PLEASE HELP ME ):  (bdw it is set uncapped)

replies.body:
FPS issues are typically caused by Display Driver or windows performance settings. Since there are a number of steps that can be taken to resolve this, I recommend checking out our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to assist you.

If you still encounter low FPS, let me know.
Dude TY SOO MUCH ^_^ My FPS is back at 100-300 I hope you have a good day.
